data.name: Into the Loop Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-380M or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Have one
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: Thanks for trying out my game!
I hope you enjoyed the game!
